turns.speaker: CAMERON
turns.text: You got something on your mind?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: I counted on you to help my cause. You and that thug are obviously failing. Aren't we ever going on our date?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: I really, really, really wanna go, but I can't.  Not unless my sister goes.

turns.speaker: CAMERON
turns.text: I'm workin' on it. But she doesn't seem to be goin' for him.

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Lesbian?  No. I found a picture of Jared Leto in one of her drawers, so I'm pretty sure she's not harboring same-sex tendencies.

turns.speaker: CAMERON
turns.text: So that's the kind of guy she likes? Pretty ones?

turns.speaker: BIANCA
turns.text: Who knows?  All I've ever heard her say is that she'd dip before dating a guy that smokes.
